summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding the transfer of assets related to Jeffrey Epstein. It includes communications between associates at Deutsche Bank discussing the logistics of the transfer and wishing each other a happy Thanksgiving.

keyFacts: The document is an email correspondence regarding the transfer of assets related to Jeffrey Epstein.
Vahe Stepanian and Amanda Kirby are associates at Deutsche Bank involved in the asset transfer.
The email chain includes discussions about the timing of the asset transfer, scheduled for the following Monday.
The correspondence takes place on the day before Thanksgiving, with associates wishing each other well for the holiday.
Several individuals are mentioned in the email chain, but their specific roles are not detailed.
